channel.title: About me on Patrick's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in About me on Patrick's Homepage

item.title: First Hugo Homepage
item.description: My first real project with Hugo I is this website. I didn’t want to create a over complexified project as a first thing with hugo so I decided to finally make a homepage for myself with it.

item.title: Haus Einsiedler
item.description: One of my first websites, had been a information page for my grandma’s holiday apartment. The website is based on Joomla but with a custom template. By the way it was the first Joomla template which I wrote. Here you can visit the page: Haus Einsiedler
